description: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team in Brussels. In this role, you will develop, test, and maintain software solutions. The ideal candidate has experience with JavaScript, React, and backend frameworks like Node.js. Collaboration with cross-functional teams and ensuring scalability of solutions are key responsibilities.

Join Notion as a Web Developer Intern. You will assist with maintaining and improving our web platform. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required, and experience with modern web frameworks is a plus. This is a hands-on opportunity to work with a world-class engineering team.

We are hiring a Data Scientist to analyze complex data sets, create predictive models, and provide actionable insights for business decisions. The ideal candidate should be proficient in Python, machine learning frameworks, and data visualization tools. Prior experience in a similar role is preferred.

Raycast is looking for a part-time UI/UX Designer to work remotely. You will create intuitive and beautiful user experiences across our products. Expertise in design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD is required. Experience in conducting user research is a plus.

Loom is seeking a Frontend Developer Intern to assist with building interactive, high-performing web applications. Proficiency in React and experience with JavaScript is required. This is an exciting opportunity to work with an experienced team and contribute to user-facing features.

Trainline is looking for a DevOps Engineer to optimize our infrastructure and ensure seamless deployment pipelines. You will manage CI/CD, automate infrastructure, and improve system reliability. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP), Docker, and Kubernetes is essential.

Figma is hiring a Backend Engineer to design scalable backend systems, ensuring performance and reliability. You will work on APIs, databases, and backend logic. Strong experience with Java, Node.js, and database management systems like PostgreSQL or MongoDB is required.

Dropbox is looking for a Junior Mobile Developer to help build and improve our mobile apps. You should be familiar with Android or iOS development and have experience with mobile frameworks like React Native or Swift. This is a part-time position based in Berlin.

Spotify is searching for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to build and optimize machine learning models that enhance the personalized music experience for users. Applicants should have experience with deep learning, recommendation systems, and Python libraries like TensorFlow or PyTorch.

Apple is hiring a Software Architect to lead the development of our large-scale software systems. You will be responsible for defining the architecture and ensuring system scalability. Strong expertise in distributed systems, microservices architecture, and cloud infrastructure is required.
